channel.title: Main site down - Error establishing a database connection
channel.description:
http://www.carloop.io/ gives error: Error establishing a database connection
Thanks,
Andy

item.description:
carloop.io is up now and we’ve added it to a monitoring service

item.source: Main site down - Error establishing a database connection

item.title: Main site down - Error establishing a database connection
item.dc:creator: alanm
item.description:
Hey Trey, the site was restored the same day (27 days ago). It must’ve gone down ago. This is super embarrassing, so we’ll add an alert to make sure we know when the site goes down. This is an open source / side project so we do our best to keep things working. Thanks for letting me know!

Read full topic
